title: Did the FEC Chair Ask Trump for Evidence of Voter Fraud, Writing ‘Lay Your Cards on the Table’?
subtitle: A remarkably forthright open letter, supposedly written by Ellen Weintraub to the U.S. president, was shared online in August 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. Federal Election Commission Chair Ellen Weintraub wrote an open letter to President Donald Trump in August 2019, asking him to share any evidence he had of voter fraud.
